summary: An Ordinance providing for and directing the return to The Seattle Electric Company of the sum of three thousand dollars ($3,000.00), deposited with the City Treasurer as a guarantee under the provisions of the ordinance granting to The Seattle Electric Company, its successors and assigns, a franchise authorizing the construction, maintenance and operation of a street railway upon certain parts of Second Avenue, Denny Way, Second Avenue North, Roy Street, Third Avenue North and other streets and places in the City of Seattle.
